{"id":949650198,"question_id":2728,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1683991021,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/949650198/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sum in a Matrix","memory":"65.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int matrixSum(int[][] nums) {\n     \n        \n        int res = 0;\n\n        int h = nums.length;\n        int w = nums[0].length;\n        \n        boolean[][] bool =new boolean[h][w];\n        \n        \n        for(int[] row : nums){\n            Arrays.sort(row);\n        }\n        \n        \n        for(int j=w-1; j>=0; j--){\n            int max =0;\n            for(int i=0; i<h; i++){\n                max = Math.max(max, nums[i][j]);\n            }\n            res += max;\n        }\n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        return res;\n        \n    }\n    \n    /*\n    \n   [[1,8,16,15,12,9,15,11,18,6,16,4,9,4],\n    [3,19,8,17,19,4,9,3,2,10,15,17,3,11],\n    [13,10,19,20,6,17,15,14,16,8,1,17,0,2],\n    [12,20,0,19,15,10,7,10,2,6,18,7,7,4],\n    [17,14,2,2,10,16,15,3,9,17,9,3,17,10],\n    [17,6,19,17,18,9,14,2,19,12,10,18,7,9],\n    [5,6,5,1,19,8,15,2,2,4,4,1,2,17],\n    [12,16,8,16,7,6,18,13,18,8,14,15,20,11],\n    [2,10,19,3,15,18,20,10,6,7,0,8,3,7],\n    [11,5,10,13,1,3,4,7,1,18,20,17,19,2],\n    [0,3,20,6,19,18,3,12,2,11,3,1,19,0],\n    [6,5,3,15,6,1,0,17,13,19,3,8,2,7],\n    [2,20,9,11,13,5,1,16,14,1,19,3,12,6]]*/\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sum-in-a-matrix","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
